dt2.10:1.1.pli: Rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi vippayuttā?

dt2.10:1.2.pli: Te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:2.5.pli: manāyatanena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …pe…

dt2.10:2.6.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:3.4.pli: phoṭṭhabbadhātuyā ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:3.5.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:4.4.pli: maggasaccena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:4.5.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:5.5.pli: purisindriyena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:5.6.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:6.1.pli: Manindriyena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:6.2.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:7.4.pli: domanassindriyena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:7.5.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:8.1.pli: Upekkhindriyena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:8.2.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:9.10.pli: avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:9.11.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:10.3.pli: phassapaccayā vedanāya ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:10.4.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:11.3.pli: kammabhavena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:11.4.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:12.1.pli: Rūpabhavena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:12.2.pli: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi tīhi dhātūhi vippayuttā.

dt2.10:13.3.pli: paridevena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:13.4.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:14.16.pli: ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:14.17.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:15.6.pli: manasikārena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:15.7.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:16.1.pli: Adhimokkhena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:16.2.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:17.2.pli: akusalehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:17.3.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:18.1.pli: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.10:18.2.pli: dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:18.3.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:19.1.pli: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:19.2.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:20.1.pli: Vipākehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:20.2.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:21.2.pli: saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:21.3.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:22.2.pli: anupādinnupādāniyehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:22.3.pli: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.

dt2.10:23.2.pli: asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:23.3.pli: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.

dt2.10:24.1.pli: Savitakkasavicārehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:24.2.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:25.2.pli: pītisahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:25.3.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:26.1.pli: Avitakkaavicārehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:26.2.pli: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi ekāya dhātuyā vippayuttā.

dt2.10:27.1.pli: Sukhasahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:27.2.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:28.1.pli: Upekkhāsahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:28.2.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:29.9.pli: mahaggatehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:29.10.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:30.2.pli: paṇītehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:30.3.pli: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā. –12

dt2.10:31.1.pli: Parittārammaṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:31.2.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:32.8.pli: maggādhipatīhi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:32.9.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:33.1.pli: Anuppannehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:33.2.pli: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.

dt2.10:34.2.pli: anāgatārammaṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:34.3.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:35.4.pli: ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:35.5.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:36.2.pli: anidassanasappaṭighehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:36.3.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:37.4.pli: hetūhi ceva sahetukehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.10:37.5.pli: sahetukehi ceva na ca hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.10:37.6.pli: hetūhi ceva hetusampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.10:37.7.pli: hetusampayuttehi ceva na ca hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.10:37.8.pli: na hetusahetukehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:37.9.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:38.5.pli: rūpīhi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:38.6.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:39.1.pli: Lokuttarehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:39.2.pli: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.

dt2.10:40.3.pli: āsavehi ceva sāsavehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.10:40.4.pli: āsavehi ceva āsavasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.10:40.5.pli: āsavasampayuttehi ceva no ca āsavehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:40.6.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:41.2.pli: āsavavippayuttehi anāsavehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:41.3.pli: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.

dt2.10:42.8.pli: parāmāsehi ceva parāmaṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:42.9.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:43.2.pli: parāmāsavippayuttehi aparāmaṭṭhehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:43.3.pli: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.

dt2.10:44.8.pli: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattīhi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:44.9.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:45.4.pli: upādādhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:45.5.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:46.1.pli: Anupādinnehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:46.2.pli: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.

dt2.10:47.5.pli: kilesehi ceva saṅkilesikehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.10:47.6.pli: kilesehi ceva saṅkiliṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.10:47.7.pli: saṅkiliṭṭhehi ceva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.10:47.8.pli: kilesehi ceva kilesasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.10:47.9.pli: kilesasampayuttehi ceva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:47.10.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:48.2.pli: kilesavippayuttehi asaṅkilesikehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:48.3.pli: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.

dt2.10:49.4.pli: bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:49.5.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:50.2.pli: savicārehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:50.3.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:51.2.pli: avicārehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:51.3.pli: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi ekāya dhātuyā vippayuttā.

dt2.10:52.2.pli: pītisahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:52.3.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:53.1.pli: Sukhasahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:53.2.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:54.1.pli: Upekkhāsahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:54.2.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:55.3.pli: anuttarehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.10:55.4.pli: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.

dt2.10:56.5.pli: saraṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi vippayuttā?

dt2.10:56.6.pli: Te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.11:1.2.pli: maggasaccena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttā?

dt2.11:1.3.pli: Te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;

dt2.11:1.4.pli: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.

dt2.11:1.6.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.11:2.2.pli: purisindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttāti?

dt2.11:2.5.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.11:3.4.pli: domanassindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …pe…

dt2.11:3.5.pli: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;

dt2.11:3.8.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.11:4.1.pli: Upekkhindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …

dt2.11:4.2.pli: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena dvīhi dhātūhi sampayuttā;

dt2.11:4.5.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.11:5.14.pli: kammabhavena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;

dt2.11:5.15.pli: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.

dt2.11:5.17.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.11:6.1.pli: Paridevena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttāti?

dt2.11:6.4.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.11:7.3.pli: domanassena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …

dt2.11:7.4.pli: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;

dt2.11:7.7.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.11:8.14.pli: hetūhi ceva sahetukehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.11:8.15.pli: hetūhi ceva hetusampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.11:8.17.pli: āsavehi ceva sāsavehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.11:8.18.pli: āsavehi ceva āsavasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.11:8.27.pli: kilesehi ceva saṅkilesikehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.11:8.28.pli: kilesehi ceva saṅkiliṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.11:8.29.pli: kilesehi ceva kilesasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttā?

dt2.11:8.30.pli: Te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;

dt2.11:8.31.pli: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.

dt2.11:8.33.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
